Class FMIndex

  • java.lang.Object

    public class FMIndex
extends Object
implements PeptideMapper
    The FM index.
    Author:
    Dominik Kopczynski, Marc Vaudel

    • Constructor Detail

      • FMIndex

        public FMIndex(WaitingHandler waitingHandler,
               boolean displayProgress,
               PeptideVariantsPreferences peptideVariantsPreferences,
               SearchParameters searchParameters)
        Constructor. If PTM settings are provided the index will contain modification information, ignored if null.
        Parameters:
        waitingHandler - the waiting handler
        displayProgress - if true, the progress is displayed
        peptideVariantsPreferences - contains all parameters for variants
        searchParameters - the search parameters

      • FMIndex

        public FMIndex(WaitingHandler waitingHandler,
               boolean displayProgress,
               PtmSettings ptmSettings,
               PeptideVariantsPreferences peptideVariantsPreferences)
        Constructor. If PTM settings are provided the index will contain modification information, ignored if null.
        Parameters:
        waitingHandler - the waiting handler
        displayProgress - if true, the progress is displayed
        ptmSettings - contains modification parameters for identification
        peptideVariantsPreferences - contains all parameters for variants
